title: Developing Peer Assessment Competencies for Team-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Team Project Experience and Fundamental Scientific Knowledge
context.additional_context: Offline team activities using digital tools and project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate team members' accountability, initiative, and collaboration skills across three distinct categories
Learners can develop and validate peer assessment tools by applying design thinking methodologies
Learners can provide fair peer feedback using a 5-point Likert scale
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
